name: Lightning Ball (timofey.lutsenko)
description:
The application is a dynamic puzzle.

The longer and the farther the ball is pulled, the more energy accumulates at the ball for throwing.

The purpose of the game is to break all the plates. Each throw takes a ball. A certain number of balls is given.

The "Reset" button gives the next ball.

The player goes to the next level when all the plates are broken.

If all the balls are exhausted, then the game is lost and the player can repeat the attempt and goes back to the three levels below by pressing the button

"Reset".
